pages.text: $(l:https://github.com/Mowmaster/Pedestals/wiki/Item-Dropper)Wiki Link/$ $(br) This Includes these upgrades: $(li)Quarry$(li)Quarry Blacklist$(li)Energy Quarry$(li)Energy Quarry Blacklist

Crafted with the Breaker, Magnet, Filter(any), and Smelter Upgrades.$(br)Functions similar to the tree chopper, except it breaks blocks.$(br)Like the Breaker Upgrade it was crafted with, It breaks blocks dropping the items, Enchanting this upgrade with silktouch or fortune will apply those effects to the mining.$(br)Like the Magnet Upgrade it was crafted with, it will magnet up items within the range of operation, putting those items in the pedestal to be transferred out.

Like the Filter Upgrade it was crafted with, it uses an inventory 'below' as a whitelist of blocks to break, the blacklist version will skip the blocks when mining.$(br)Like the Smelter Upgrade it was crafted with, it requires fuel to run. $(br)Powering the pedestal off will halt all its functions except fuel absorption.
It can be enchanted with Speed, Range(Effects Height), and Capacity (Effects AOE) Enchantments.$(br)It can also be enchanted with Silktouch and Fortune vanilla enchants using the anvil upgrade.
